metadata.title: CVE-2020-14001 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The kramdown gem before 2.3.0 for Ruby processes the template option insideKramdown documents by default, which allows unintended read access (such astemplate="/etc/passwd") or unintended embedded Ruby code execution (such asa string that begins with template="string://<%= `). NOTE: kramdown is usedin Jekyll, GitLab Pages, GitHub Pages, and Thredded Forum.

criterions.comment: ruby-kramdown: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
